definition: Lake Tai near Wuxi City 無錫|无锡, bordering on Jiangsu and Zhejiang, one of China's largest freshwater lakes
highest/greatest/too (much)/very/extremely
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]
Taihu county in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1 qing4], Anhui

sentences.english: "Taihu Pearl" Wuxi is a three-year history of the southern city.
sentences.chinese: “太湖明珠”無錫是一座具有三千年歷史的江南名城。

sentences.english: John spent his weekends messing around in his boat on the Taihu River.
sentences.chinese: 約翰週末坐在船上泛遊在太湖之上。

sentences.english: Taihu Basin was always one of the most developed districts in China.
sentences.chinese: 太湖流域歷來是我國經濟比較發達地區之一。

sentences.english: Hence, this research provided some meaning results, which should be a potential reference for restoration and rehabilitation of submerged macrophytes in Taihu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 本研究結果爲太湖沉水植物恢復重建提供參考。

sentences.english: After breakfast we went to Taihu Park.
sentences.chinese: 早飯後我們去太湖公園。

sentences.english: Taihu basin belongs to plain river network and river systems are connected with each other.
sentences.chinese: 太湖流域屬於平原河網區，水系相五連通。

sentences.english: Here are a large amount of Taihu Stones with strange shapes in various poses, all vivid to life.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是一片奇形怪狀的太湖石，千姿百態，惟妙惟肖。

sentences.english: Lake Taihu, Hongze and Caohu are already in eutrophic state.
sentences.chinese: 太湖，洪澤湖和巢湖富營養化曾經在狀況。

sentences.english: If you want to be put in too on lakefront, we do not agree for certain.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要放在太湖邊上，我們肯定不同意。

sentences.english: The Taihu Lake basin is a typical pollution-induced water shortage area in China.
sentences.chinese: 太湖流域是我國典型的水質型缺水地區。

sentences.english: Boindication of organochlorine pesticides by night heron in taihu wetland ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 太湖溼地生態系統有機氯污染的夜鷺生物指示。

sentences.english: Taihu Lake Basin is one of the developed areas in our country.
sentences.chinese: 太湖流域是我國經濟發達地區之一。

sentences.english: The lake's environmental problems include accelerated eutrophication , or aging, caused by nitrogen and phosphorus enrichment.
sentences.chinese: 太湖環境問題包括氮磷元素富集帶來的富營養化。

sentences.english: The Grand Buddha is standing straight near the Taihu Lake in Wuxi.
sentences.chinese: 大佛像站在附近連續在無錫太湖。

sentences.english: Let 's enjoy the wonderful view of Taihu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來欣賞太湖的奇麗風光吧。

sentences.english: The suggested control measures for Taihu Icefish are recommended for Bighead.
sentences.chinese: 建議控制方法同太湖新銀魚。

definition: Xihu or West lake (place name)/West Lake in Hangzhou 杭州, Zhejiang/Xihu or Hsihu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Hongze Lake in Jiangsu province
Dongting Lake in northeast Hunan province
Qiandao Lake in Zhejiang, aka Xin'an River Reservoir, created as part of a large hydroelectric project in 1959
Poyang Lake in Shangrao 上饒|上饶[Shang4 rao2], Jiangxi

south of Changjiang or Yangtze river/south of the lower reaches of Changjiang/often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces/a province during Qing times/in literature, refers to the sunny south/Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)
Dianshan Lake between Shanghai Municipality and Jiangsu Province
Chaohu prefecture-level city in Anhui/Chaohu lake
Suzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
Jinghu district of Wuhu city 蕪湖市|芜湖市[Wu2 hu2 shi4], Anhui
Qiantang River that loops around Hangzhou 杭州[Hang2 zhou1] in Zhejiang Province 浙江省[Zhe4 jiang1 Sheng3]
Chongming Island
patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu/same as 江南水鄉|江南水乡[Jiang1 nan2 shui3 xiang1]
Yixing county level city in Wuxi 無錫|无锡[Wu2 xi1], Jiangsu
Yangzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
Shaobo Lake, freshwater lake in Jiangsu Province
